Text:
Oh right!  Fair warning, if you're from North America you'll be IP banned from the Gametribe EU version of DOMO.  If you want to play it and you're from there, you'll need to download the Aeria Games version of the client.  Strangely, I think Canada's also banned from the EU version...

Equally European players are IP banned from the north American DOMO.
